Calculator - User’s Guide

calc.calculator(operacao: str, a: int | float, b: int | float) → int | float

Main function

Parameters:

  • operacao – Operation name

  • a – Number A

  • b – Number B

Returns:

Calc result

calc.div(a: int | float, b: int | float) → int | float

Div function

Parameters:

  • a – Number A

  • b – Number B

Returns:

Result sum a/b

calc.mult(a: int | float, b: int | float) → int | float

Mult function

Parameters:

  • a – Number A

  • b – Number B

Returns:

Result sum a*b

calc.sub(a: int | float, b: int | float) → int | float

Sub function

Parameters:

  • a – Number A

  • b – Number B

Returns:

Result sum a-b

calc.sum(a: int | float, b: int | float) → int | float

Sum function

Parameters:

  • a – Number A

  • b – Number B

Returns:

Result sum a+b
